course_name: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)
summary: The course covers a comprehensive range of topics related to Check Point technology, including an overview of the technology, installation of firewalls in standalone and distributed environments, product design and architecture, simultaneous administration in R80, security policy management, working with inline and ordered layers, understanding URL filtering and application control, implementing SSL tunneling and SSL bridging, configuring content awareness, monitoring traffic, connections, system health and logs, working with legacy SmartConsole applications, network address translations, managing user access with local authentication, managing AD authentication with identity awareness, basic concepts of VPN, and configuring site-to-site VPN. The course is the first in Israel to include the latest version of the product in a full virtual environment, providing a lab environment for practice for Check Point's clients both in Israel and abroad. The course is hybrid, with classes held at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, offering flexibility to participants.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA).

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course provides comprehensive training on the latest version of Check Point's product in a fully virtual environment. The lab environment used in the course is designed for practice by Check Point's clients both in Israel and abroad.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 22.11.2024.
- Duration: 6 sessions, 30 academic hours.
- Schedule: Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Special Sessions: On 22.11.2024, a session will be held on Friday from 09:00 to 13:00. On 26.11.2024, a session will be held on Tuesday from 17:30 to 21:30.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning: Classes will be held at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, according to your preference.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Check Point Technology Overview.
- Introduction to the Lab.
- Installing Firewalls in Standalone and Distributed Environments.
- Product Design and Architecture.
- Simultaneous Administration in R80.
- Security Policy Management.
- Working with Inline and Ordered Layers.
- Understanding URL Filtering and Application Control.
- Implementing SSL Tunneling and SSL Bridging.
- Configuring Content Awareness.
- Monitoring Traffic, Connections, System Health, and Logs.
- Working with Legacy SmartConsole Applications.
- Network Address Translations.
- Managing User Access with Local Authentication.
- Managing AD Authentication with Identity Awareness.
- Basic Concepts of VPN.
- Configuring Site to Site VPN.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University invites you to acquire the most required certification in the field of information security and cyber security.
